      • approveSuggestions

        @GET
@Path("approvesuggestion-{id}-{verdict}")
@Produces("text/json")
public java.lang.String approveSuggestions​(@PathParam("id")
                                           int id,
                                           @PathParam("verdict")
                                           java.lang.Boolean verdict)
                                    throws java.lang.SecurityException,
                                           java.lang.IllegalStateException,
                                           javax.transaction.NotSupportedException,
                                           javax.transaction.SystemException,
                                           javax.naming.NamingException,
                                           javax.transaction.RollbackException,
                                           javax.transaction.HeuristicMixedException,
                                           javax.transaction.HeuristicRollbackException
        Parameters:
        id - id de la suggestion
        verdict - approve la suggestion (true) ou non (false)
        Returns:
        le json de la suggestion
        Throws:
